wikipedia_page.main: Carlo Martelli (born December 12, 1935) is an English composer and viola player of Italian extraction who saw early success and high profile performances with his orchestral and chamber music concert works, but later turned to light music and film scores. He is particularly known for his idiomatic arrangements of music for strings.

response: * Carlo Martelli, (born 1935) has lived in Woolwich since the early 1960s.
